original_text: Never since the world began has it been heard that anyone opened the eyes of a man born blind.
korean_text: 창세 이후로 맹인으로 난 자의 눈을 뜨게 하였다 함을 듣지 못하였으니

sentences.original_text: Never since the world began has it been heard
sentences.korean_translation: 세상이 시작된 이래로 들은 적이 없습니다

sentences.original_text: that anyone opened the eyes of a man born blind.
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 낳은 맹인의 눈을 떼어 주었다는 것을
